description: Try our easy to follow Choc-bana-maca Smoothie recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Smoothie & frapp√©,Pescatarian,Low salt,Seafood free,Gluten free,Egg free,Sesame free,Soy free,Vegetarian,Vegan,Low fat,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Choc-bana-maca Smoothie Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Whizz 1 frozen banana in a blender with 2 tsp Macro Organic Maca Powder, 1 tsp Macro Organic Cacao Powder, 1 cup Macro Organic Coconut Water, 1/2 cup coconut yoghurt, 1 tsp vanilla extract and ice cubes until smooth, thick and creamy.
Pour into glasses and serve. * Macro Maca and Cacao powders are available in the Health Aisle.
